item.title: Backing Up Home Videos
item.description: When it comes to pictures and videos of my family, no amount of money can recreate them if they're lost. So what's the best way to keep them safe and organised?
item.dc:creator: Tom Rodrigues

item.title: RNA Vaccines
item.description: Developing vaccines usually takes a long time, but during a pandemic, time is at a premium. RNA vaccines might be the solution.
item.dc:creator: Tom Rodrigues

item.title: My DIY Smart Sprinklers
item.description: Smart sprinkler systems make caring for your garden dynamic and easy. How easy is it to make our own instead?
item.dc:creator: Tom Rodrigues

item.title: My DIY Smart Lights
item.description: Smart lights are the easiest and most fun way of getting into home automation, but they can be expensive!
item.dc:creator: Tom Rodrigues

item.title: MAC Address Spoofing
item.description: Wi-Fi networks know who you are by looking at your MAC address. What happens when we manipulate this?
item.dc:creator: Tom Rodrigues

item.title: Wi-Fi Cracking
item.description: We use Wi-Fi every day for everything from keeping in touch with friends and family to online banking. But how safe are we when we use Wi-Fi?
item.dc:creator: Tom Rodrigues

item.title: My DIY Smart Thermostat
item.description: Controlling your home's temperature has never been easier with smart thermostats. How about making your own?
item.dc:creator: Tom Rodrigues

item.title: My $99 Apple Smart Home
item.description: With a growing smart home tech market, many of us want to get involved but are put off by the high price tags. What if you could automate your home for less than $100?
item.dc:creator: Tom Rodrigues
